result.eng: I put all the money on the horse.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: I had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.

result.orig: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm

result.eng: You started the war.

result.eng: Everything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.

result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.

result.eng: I remember that she added a lot to the course.

result.eng: The waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.

result.orig: Chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampall

result.eng: Who did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
